name: Habits
description: The world first augmented reality fashion e-commerce, powered by blockchain. Habits streams fashion products as 3D models on userâ€™s bodies, so clients can visually try them on. Habits has its own Admin Panel, where brands can upload new products or manage existing ones. As users try and purchase trough the App or Mirror we collect new and innovative KPIs; Habits elaborates this data for brands, to help them boost their online presence.
